products.name: Broadside
products.notes: Brewed with Pale Ale malt and First Gold hops, Broadside is a dark ruby red beer rich in fruitcake aromas, almonds and conserved fruit.

products.name: Cambridge Beer Festival Special
products.notes: A one-off, black stout, aged in oak casks previously occupied by Adnams Copper House Distillery's North Cove Vodka. This additional maturation has imparted flavours of vanilla, coffee and chocolate. Warming with a dry finish.

products.name: Fat Sprat
products.notes: A pale amber summer beer with a lovely citrus, grapefruit aroma and some spicy notes. On the palate, the citrus character of the hops shines through, balanced with a light biscuit flavour and a crisp, dry finish.

products.name: Ghost Ship
products.notes: This pale ale has a good assertive pithy bitterness and a malty backbone. It is brewed with a selection of malts -- Pale Ale, Rye Crystal and Cara. Citra and a blend of other American hop varieties create some great citrus flavours.

products.name: Mosaic
products.notes: Made with Mosaic hops, this pale blonde has bags of personality with bold mango, peach, lemon and pine flavours and a dry hoppy finish.

products.name: Southwold Bitter
products.notes: A beautiful copper-coloured beer, late- and dry-hopped with Fuggles for a distinctive, lingering hoppiness. Brewed with the finest East Anglian malted barley, sourced locally to the brewery.

products.name: Greenhorn Rising
products.notes: Amber in colour with citrus, floral and pine aromas. Grapefruit and tropical fruit flavours are balanced by some caramel sweetness. Peppery bitterness lingers on the finish.

products.name: Motueka
products.notes: A pale hoppy session beer brewed with Motueka hops. It has flavours and aromas of tropical fruit and sweet citrus with a delicate bitter finish.

products.name: Arran Dark
products.notes: A well-balanced malty beer with plenty of roast and hop in the taste and a dry, bitter finish.

products.name: Blonde
products.notes: Aroma is malty, toasted, hoppy and citrusy. Flavour has a malty base with zesty and fruity flavours and a floral hoppy finish.

products.name: Edwin Taylor's Extra Stout
products.notes: A pleasant bitter beer with a strong roast malt flavour. Brewed using Pearl Pale and Crystal malts, roast barley and Hercules hops.

products.name: Shefford Mild
products.notes: A dark beer with a well balanced, roast malt taste.

products.name: Dark Mild
products.notes: A full bodied dark mild with hints of liquorice and roast barley.

products.name: Flat Cap
products.notes: A light bitter with biscuit malt and fruit flavours.

products.name: Comrade Bill Bartram's Egalitarian Anti-Imperialist Soviet Stout
products.notes: A bold and tasty Russian stout with a mouthfilling, airy texture and a lot of enjoyable, peppery, bitter chocolate flavours.

products.name: Thy Last Drop
products.notes: Based on a traditional London Porter recipe.

products.name: Tour de Force
products.notes: Trip the light fantastic with a light relief after all that heavy going. With a certain je ne sais quoi.

products.name: Black Eye
products.notes: This extremely hoppy beer pulls no punches and will hit you full force in the face! Little to no aroma masks the brutal assault that your tastes buds will have once you take your first sip. Roasty and hoppy...not for the faint of heart (or palate). Unfined. Brewed in collaboration with Hand Drawn Monkey, Huddersfield.

products.name: I Am Not a Fruit Beer Too!
products.notes: A slightly soured wheat beer with added beetroot. A classic flavour mix of sweet (from the wheat) and sour, this beer is a perfect thirst quenching ale for the summer months. Unfined.

products.name: Ronin
products.notes: Rice, koji, ginger, and sake yeast were all used in brewing this beer. Slightly sweet and very refreshing, it has a lot going on. The finish is long with a slight warming sensation. Unfined. Brewed in collaboration with Hand Drawn Monkey, Huddersfield, and Three Blind Mice, Ely.

products.name: Texas Pecan Coffee Mild
products.notes: A brown non-traditional mild. Pecan coffee imported from Texas is added to complement the mild flavors. Unfined.

products.name: Bitter
products.notes: Malty, tawny brown bitter with a noble hop finish.

products.name: Longhair BPA
products.notes: A light copper-hued beer with a big nose of Summit hops and a bittering from British Admiral and Pioneer hops. Full of zesty, effervescent flavours and a great body.

products.name: Theory 143
products.notes: Dark red malty comfort beer.

products.name: BBC 2
products.notes: A true session pale ale; a full body and malty flavours make this beer very deceptive. American hops give it a tropical fruit and citrus punch.

products.name: Brentwood Best
products.notes: A traditional, light-coloured best bitter with a well-rounded flavour and aroma.

products.name: Chockwork Orange
products.notes: A deep chocolate malty beer brewed with oranges to give it that extra pizazz and matured to provide a classic old ale style beer.

products.name: Marvellous Maple Mild
products.notes: A dark brown mild with a hint of maple syrup.

products.name: Summer Virgin
products.notes: A light golden ale with American hops creating a refreshing citrus pint.

products.name: Milk Stout
products.notes: Dark creamy stout, reviving an old Bristol tradition. Black in colour with a creamy mouthfeel.

products.name: Nova
products.notes: A light malt base: Maris Otter, Carapils and wheat malt allows the bright, fresh and zesty hop aromas to shine, underpinned by herbal and floral notes.

products.name: Citra
products.notes: Hoppy session beer brewed with Citra hops. Flavours and aromas of pineapples and mangoes with a light mouthfeel.

products.name: Old Street Pale
products.notes: Medium sweet American pale ale. A strong zesty citrus flavour with a fairly sweet finish, along with sticky pine, grass and toast notes.

products.name: Exciseman's 80/-
products.notes: The bittersweet blend of flavours is derived from the crystal, black and pale ale malts, and fresh, aromatic hops. Dark amber in colour, toffee aromas and full-bodied.

products.name: Greenmantle
products.notes: A brown bittersweet ale, with licorice aromas and a lightly bitter aftertaste.

products.name: Highwayman
products.notes: Light brown session bitter.

products.name: Single Hop 'Triskel'
products.notes: The single hop is Triskel, a French hop from the Alsace region, fresh grapefruit and slight lemony sharpness with a bitter hop finish.

products.name: Devil's Rest
products.notes: Deceptively drinkable, with a burnt orange colour and full flavour in the mouth. Huge amounts of Simcoe & Centennial hops find their way into the kettle, with even more sneaking in post fermentation for a 'proper' IPA flavour.

products.name: Plateau
products.notes: Pale gold in colour, with a crisp malt edge and sharp bitterness. Plateau has been hopped at different stages of the brew, with a big mix of US & NZ hops to satisfy the discerning drinker.

products.name: American Rye
products.notes: A shed-load of American hops provide a delightful marmalade/citrus bitterness, well balanced by the sweetness of the malt, while delivering a charcteristic peppery rye flavour.

products.name: Axe Edge
products.notes: Hopped with Amarillo, Citra and Nelson Sauvin, this beer's complex flavours include mandarin orange, schnapps, pineapple, and juicy tropical fruits. It is warmingly alcoholic with a dry finish.

products.name: Moor Top
products.notes: Hopped with American Chinook hops, this oozes citrus flavour and aroma. Sweetness balanced with a lingering bitter finish backed up with a late grapefruit hit.

products.name: Rednik Stout
products.notes: Deep brown/black in colour. Aromas of burnt roast coffee, malty molasses, prunes, and a hint of smoke. It is gently sweet and sour, with a moderate bitterness.

products.name: Best Bitter
products.notes: A smooth amber ale, with a good balance of malt and subtle bittering hops.

products.name: King's Parade
products.notes: Classic best bitter. Earthy, spicy, biscuity aroma and sweet malty, but fruity finish. Well-balanced, very drinkable ale.

products.name: Sweet Chariot IPA
products.notes: Pale bitter beer, with a blend of US and UK hops.

products.name: Wayne's Brain
products.notes: In the style of a German Hefeweizen, with banana and clove flavours. Naturally cloudy.

products.name: 12th Man
products.notes: Amarillo triple-hopped beer with spicy citrus and floral aromas and taste with an orangey finish.

products.name: Castorware
products.notes: Dark, malty, and balanced by interesting hops.

products.name: Mozart's FinALE
products.notes: Amber-coloured premium bitter with grassy and citrus hop notes.

products.name: Mild Mannered
products.notes: A dark mild with a pleasant balance of sweet malt and tempered bitterness.

products.name: Sauvignon Blonde
products.notes: Aromatic golden ale brewed with Nelson Sauvin hops from New Zealand, which create characteristics reminiscent of the Kiwis' most famous wine.

products.name: A Mild With No Name
products.notes: Dark beer with hints of cherry and currants. Brewed in collaboration with Billericay Brewing Company.

products.name: Yukon Gold 3
products.notes: Brewed with 100% Maris Otter pale malt with Bullion and Bramling Cross hops. It is matured in cognac casks and acquires an aroma of oranges and cream. The taste is of sweet malt with a rounded bitterness.

products.name: Elderquad
products.notes: A pale, generously hopped session beer. Hints of sweetness, and a subtle elderflower aroma, provide a terrific balance to the hops.

products.name: Nightwatchman
products.notes: A warm, smooth, beer, red-tinged in colour and relatively well hopped.

products.name: Orchid
products.notes: A mahogany-coloured, slightly sweet a dark mild, lightly spiced with vanilla.

products.name: Peasants' Revolt
products.notes: New world hopped red ale.

products.name: Smoking Trunks
products.notes: A gently smoked porter style beer but with a twist of tropical fruit hoppy loveliness.

products.name: Apple Wheat
products.notes: Apple juice blended with a Belgian style wheat beer to create a refreshing, slightly carbonated, apple and vanilla beer. The fresh apple aroma combined with a hint of herbs and vanilla helps create a unique taste.

products.name: Black Dog
products.notes: Dryish, complex dark mild. Caramel binds a good cross-section of malt, roast and dark berry fruit flavours and there is a hint of sweetness.

products.name: Black Eagle Imperial Stout
products.notes: Raisins and soft fruit complement roast malt in this warming dark ruby stout. Bittersweet conclusion.

products.name: Cambridge Bitter
products.notes: A mild brown bitter with a good balance of malt and hop character giving a pleasing session drink.

products.name: Double Swan
products.notes: This beer has a floral aroma, refreshing to the taste with good bitterness and a slightly sweet mouthfeel.

products.name: Golden Newt
products.notes: A beer with prominent hop character; a blend of Fuggles, Goldings and Cascade has been used in the recipe to bring the delicate hop flavour and aroma to the fore.  The use of Cascade gives a pleasing citrus aroma.

products.name: Cherry Blonde
products.notes: A light blonde bitter delicately infused with essence of cherry to produce a Belgian style fruit flavoured beer.

products.name: Ginger
products.notes: Made using ginger root extract for a refreshing flavour that is not overpowering.

products.name: Nailmaker Mild
products.notes: A well-defined hop aroma and underlying sweetness give way to a dry finish.

products.name: Cat No. 3
products.notes: Pale yellow session beer brewed with four pale malt varieties and highly hopped with American Chinook.

products.name: Meow Mild
products.notes: Chestnut coloured mild. Roasted flavours throughout, backed up by fruit and coffee flavours. The hops in the aroma appear again in the aftertaste.

products.name: Doctor Syntax
products.notes: Dark and bitter. An IPA backbone with Munich malt. Heavy on the Summit and Columbus additions right through the boil and dry hopped to give the final punch.

products.name: Old Fellow IPA
products.notes: Amber in colour. Floral with big hop character, with enough sweetness to balance the bitterness.

products.name: Shy'Ann
products.notes: A golden bitter ale bursting with floral and fruity citrus aromas and flavours. Dry hopped with Cascade and Chinook.

products.name: Voltaire
products.notes: An American red style ale with six different US hops. Dry hopped for extra bite.

products.name: Peckin' Order
products.notes: Amber gold coloured lager with citrus notes. A dry finish with a pinch of spice.

products.name: Rooster Booster
products.notes: Strong pale ale brewed with American hops for bitterness and English full cone hops for aroma.

products.name: Hook Island Red
products.notes: A full bodied, aromatic red rye ale brewed with malted barley, 20% rye, and Chinook, Columbus and Simcoe hops.

products.name: Railway Porter
products.notes: A Porter in the classic London style with our own twist. Aromas of chocolate and coffee with hints of caramel, brewed with British East Kent Goldings hops.

products.name: Highlander
products.notes: A dark amber-coloured bittersweet ale with an aroma of caramel malt and a hint of lemon. Tastes of rich caramel malts with a touch of toffee and soft citrus flavours leading to a good bitter hoppy finish.

products.name: Vital Spark
products.notes: A dark ruby red coloured beer with an aroma of berries and roasted malts. Flavours of dark fruity and roast malts develop to a long dry finish. Deliciously drinkable and a real cracker.

products.name: Hop Lobster
products.notes: Brewed with East Anglian pale malt and five American hops to give a strong pale beer with big explosive hop notes.

products.name: Red Square
products.notes: An American style red ale with a Soviet twist. Three local malts and three American hops combine to give a strong fruity hop aroma with a good malty base leading to a lengthy dry finish.

products.name: Blonde Ash
products.notes: Wheat beer with a lemon, clove, and banana nose. Sweet fruity flavour supported by a hoppy bitterness. Caramel appears in a strong finish.

products.name: Oak
products.notes: This well balanced session beer uses Maris Otter pale ale malt to give a light amber colour, and fermented slowly to give a dry, moreish finish.

products.name: Porter
products.notes: An old-style porter. Smooth and creamy, with a dark berry flavour.

products.name: Amish Mash
products.notes: A German style weizen with the hops of an American IPA. Light, refreshing and extremely fruity as the hops balance the banana and clove notes from the German yeast. Light, refreshing and extemely fruity as the hops balance the banana and clove notes from the german yeast.

products.name: Black Jesus
products.notes: A black IPA brewed with biblical quantities of premium American hops and dehusked German roasted malt. Enjoy with chocolate, cold meats or just loaves and fishes.

products.name: Baltic Trader
products.notes: A rich and fruity export stout with plenty of hop character.

products.name: Gold Beach
products.notes: An easy drinking lager style beer to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

products.name: XX Mild
products.notes: A cask mild traditionally brewed using dark malt to give a sweet and roasted flavour.

products.name: Prince of Denmark
products.notes: A strong, dark beer of great complexity and depth.

products.name: Sussex Best Bitter
products.notes: Full-bodied brown bitter. A hoppy aroma leads to a good malt and hop balance, and a dry aftertaste.

products.name: Orkney Best
products.notes: A very refreshing, easy drinking beer. Hopped with American, Polish and New Zealand hops early and late in the copper.

products.name: The Duke
products.notes: Clear golden ale, with citrus aroma and flavours. An Orcadian nod to American IPAs!

products.name: Crop Circle
products.notes: The subtle blend of aroma and bittering hops give a crispness on the tongue which is delicately fruity, giving way to some dryness. Brewed gluten free.

products.name: Taiphoon
products.notes: A pale gold beer with hints of lemongrass and coriander.

products.name: Obsidian
products.notes: A well-structured black IPA with notes of treacle and coffee, balanced by powerful hops that make it rich and palatable.

products.name: York
products.notes: A deep copper coloured session ale with loads of berry and orange flavours and a hint of tangerine in the aroma.

products.name: Firebelly
products.notes: Double IPA with a sweet malty background overridden by an abundance of hops.

products.name: Zen
products.notes: Amber brown in colour. Malt and bitter sweet flavours with background toffee and a dry finish.

products.name: Skye Black
products.notes: Dark ale brewed with roast barley and rolled roast Scottish oatmeal, giving an almost stout-like bitterness, smoothed through the addition of pure Scottish heather honey.

products.name: Skye Red
products.notes: Reddish-hued, slightly malty and nutty in character, smooth to the taste.

products.name: Knot Just Another IPA
products.notes: A golden hoppy bitter, with a good blast of British Bodicea hops.

products.name: Norfolk Kiwi
products.notes: An easy drinking, lightly hopped straw coloured beer. A blend of English and New Zealand hops.

products.name: Chennai
products.notes: Background flavours of pale and amber malts are balanced with the resinous bitterness and herbal characteristics of Pacific Gem and Cascade hops.

products.name: Gardenia Mild
products.notes: A refreshing amber mild with the subtle floral fragrances of an English country garden.

products.name: Encore
products.notes: Glowing with a pale amber hue, this flavour packed ale leads with delicate fruit aromas, comfortably balancing a dry pine and citrus crescendo of flavour throughout followed by a finish that is long and dry.

products.name: Falcon
products.notes: A classic dark bitter with an auburn glint. Elaborately balanced use of hops and malt paves the way to complex flavours which are charming and lightly spiced.

products.name: Hairy Dog Black IPA
products.notes: A single hop brew using Apollo hops to produce a hoppy warming black IPA.

products.name: P.IPA
products.notes: An IPA made with three varieties of Polish hops.

products.name: 24 Carat Gold
products.notes: Generously hopped with a bitterness that builds steadily towards a lingering finish with spicey orangey notes.

products.name: Josephine Butler
products.notes: Golden coloured with hints of lemon and elderflower in the taste with a good hoppy finish.

products.name: Kitty Wilkinson
products.notes: Chocolate and vanilla stout.

products.name: Galaxy Trial
products.notes: New beer - description forthcoming

products.name: Kessog
products.notes: This ale is dark in colour with warm spicy flavours.

products.name: Hedgerow Hop
products.notes: A light amber beer with a kick of bitterness. Wild hops from around Swavesey provide a hoppy nose.

products.name: Slap 'n' Tickle
products.notes: A summer blonde ale. Tickle your fancy with a slap of summer refreshment. This light ale is brewed with a single hop in three stages to give a lasting finish.

products.name: Zulu Dawn
products.notes: Dark with red highlights. Citrus bitterness on a malty base.

products.name: Black Adder
products.notes: A dark bitter stout. Roast and nut aromas with a fruity balance of hops and dark malt provide an excellent lingering finish.

products.name: Lemon Adder
products.notes: Fresh citrus aromas which develop into a balanced, fruity and refreshing flavour, along with a lingering, dry, bitter finish.

products.name: Silver Adder
products.notes: A light coloured bitter with fine hop and malt combinations giving a refreshing crisp finish.

products.name: Oscar Wilde
products.notes: Roasty dark mild with suggestions of forest fruits and dark chocolate. A sweet taste yields to a more bitter finish.

products.name: Fenland Wheat
products.notes: Naturally cloudy wheat beer, brewed using Munich wheat yeast, giving aroma/taste of cloves and ripe banana with a spicy dry finish.

products.name: Wellstream
products.notes: Copper brown, full-bodied malty beer with a bitter-sweet finish. Brewed with two English hops, Challenger and East Kent Goldings.

products.name: Lanterne Rouge
products.notes: Bright golden ale. Bold, hoppy aroma, with a full tropical/citrus fruit flavour and a strong bitter finish.

products.name: Medusa
products.notes: Strong mild. Cocoa, vanilla and fruitcake aromas are backed by a satisfying yet subtle bitterness. Very drinkable.

products.name: Minerva
products.notes: Golden ale. Brewed with US, NZ and British hops for a powerful hop punch and satisfying bitterness.

products.name: Nero
products.notes: A satisfying, full-flavoured black brew with a good balance of malt, roast and fruit. Bittersweet flavours carry through to a dry finish.

products.name: Pegasus
products.notes: Fruit and some hops on the nose lead through into a fine balance of malt, fruit and hops on a bittersweet base. Malt is also present in the long, dry finish.

products.name: Cambridge Best Bitter
products.notes: Fruity notes give way to a lasting, biscuit malt finish in this pale copper, easy-drinking ale.

products.name: Cambridge Pale Ale
products.notes: Straw coloured beer with a smooth malt profile which is complemented by a restrained hop flavour.

products.name: Heavenly Matter
products.notes: A refreshing golden session bitter, with a fresh citrus taste and a lovely finish of citrus fruits.

products.name: Hot Numbers Coffee Stout
products.notes: Made with the cooperation of Hot Numbers Coffee of Cambridge.  Dark roasted malts balance the coffee and hop flavours, lactose adds sweetness to the body.

products.name: Red Watch Blueberry Ale
products.notes: A red-coloured beer brewed with fresh blueberries. A thirst-quenching, refreshing, fruity ale.

products.name: Old Freddy Walker
products.notes: A rich, dark, full-bodied old ale. Bramling Cross hops are added to provide a hint of orange and a balancing dose of bitterness.

products.name: Revival
products.notes: A very hoppy and refreshing bitter with a crisp finish and full flavour.

products.name: Midnight Mild
products.notes: A medium strength mild with a real fullness of character and flavour. Dark and subtle.

products.name: Bishops Farewell
products.notes: A strong premium beer of structured quality, dominated by elaborate fruity hop notes, with a grainy background and dry finish.

products.name: Gangster
products.notes: Ruby coloured with a rich, sweet base and powerful citrus fruit flavour with a lasting bitterness. Hopped with Simcoe, Galena and Apollo.

products.name: Paranoid
products.notes: Rose gold beer with fresh hop aromas. Big bitter character wrestles with a hoppy fruit monster. With no outright winner, they fight on to the finish.

products.name: Saison
products.notes: Medium cloudy and apricot coloured, with lemon peel on the nose. Flavours include shrivelled lime, cream cheese and coriander notes, sherbet and herb.

products.name: Gold Top
products.notes: Combining Maris Otter, the best British ale malt, with malts normally used in the finest continental lagers gives a beer with good body, caramelised undertones and a distinct gold colour.

products.name: Red Top
products.notes: A rich tan-coloured beer that is balanced on the palate, with a hint of citrus aroma. It shows all the characteristics of best English bitter.

products.name: Silver Top
products.notes: A well-crafted complex stout with a good balance of dark malts, roast barley and caramel, and a long finish.

products.name: Fruity Little Number
products.notes: A session bitter loaded with citrus hops.

products.name: Maibock
products.notes: A rong German spring ale brewed with Bacarian yeast and Munich malt, hoppy and malty.

products.name: Samuel Engel Meister Pils
products.notes: A Pilsner style beer with German Hallertau Hops. Light in colour and with a hoppy aroma.

products.name: Dark Island
products.notes: Roast malt and chocolate character with hints of fruit. A sweetish roast malt taste leads to a long-lasting roasted, slightly bitter, dry finish.

products.name: Red MacGregor
products.notes: Generally a well-balanced bitter, this tawny red ale has a powerful smack of fruit and a clean, fresh mouthfeel.

products.name: Skull Splitter
products.notes: An aroma of fruity malt with hints of dark fruit, spicy hop, dates and figs. Rich and complex palate with sweet toasted malt, molasses, fruit and hints of spice.

products.name: Amber
products.notes: The special Cara malt and carefully selected hops in Amber deliver a finely balanced bitter flavour, with hints of tropical fruit and spice sometimes even an impression of ginger.

products.name: Bitter
products.notes: Light and fruity beer with a dry, hoppy finish.

products.name: Head
products.notes: Malt and fruit sweet flavours give way to a long bittersweet aftertaste. Well balanced aroma reflects its taste. Deep red brown in colour.

products.name: Ginger Panther
products.notes: Fiery with a ginger flavour and with subtle lemon flavour notes.

products.name: Red Panther
products.notes: A beer with roasted nutty flavour and bitter spicy malts.

products.name: East Coast IPA
products.notes: An American IPA. North Norfolk Maris Otter malt with lots of New World hops, dry hopped with Columbus. Fruity, resinous and bitter. Gluten-free.

products.name: Stewkey Gose
products.notes: A wheat beer inspired by the salt marshes of Stiffkey, North Norfolk. Made with foraged ingredients -- sea purslane, wild hops, with alexanders, fennel and coriander spices and salt. Sour and salty. Gluten-free.

products.name: American Pale Ale
products.notes: Maris Otter Pale Malt gives a pale-golden, rich malty base with Citra, Amarillo and Summit late additions yielding a well-balanced hop flavour and aroma of tropical fruits, orange and pink grapefruit.

products.name: Market Porter
products.notes: Aromas of cappuccino, chocolate, dark fruits and vibrant fresh peel. Velvety and rich, with notes of coffee, chocolate and hazelnuts with warming alcohol and cocoa in the finish.

products.name: Snowdonia
products.notes: A delightfully refreshing pale ale brewed with a delicate combination of aromatic hops.

products.name: Ysgawen
products.notes: A refreshing pale ale brewed using Cascade hops with the added indulgence of elderflowers.

products.name: Citurian
products.notes: Light golden ale with grapefruit aromas and a gooseberry finish.

products.name: Royal Blue
products.notes: Traditional style ale, malty with mellow sweet citrus tones.

products.name: Saffron Blonde
products.notes: Light golden ale. Maris Otter barley and torrified wheat, plus Fuggles and Goldings hops create a delicate balance of citrus and smooth malty flavours.

products.name: Dockfield Porter
products.notes: Classic reddish black porter with roast malt aroma, chocolate and nut flavours and a spicy bitterness from Bramling Cross hops.

products.name: Raspberry Blonde
products.notes: Refreshingly blonde ale delicately infused with raspberry flavours.

products.name: 1319 Mild
products.notes: Roast malt and delicate chocolate sweetness with a slight bitter finish.

products.name: Rotten End
products.notes: Traditional coloured and strong, accompanied by a slightly sweet and nutty undertone with a bitter edge to finish.

products.name: Lushingtons
products.notes: Using only Cornish pale malt and hops from the USA, this is a new world style hoppy, fruity pale ales, but at a session strength.

products.name: Chocolate Cherry
products.notes: Smooth, well balanced stout with a subtle cherry taste.

products.name: Muck Cart Mild
products.notes: Smooth dark mild with a long liquorice finish. Roast and fruit aroma, with chocolate and coffee taste, and lingering roast finish.

products.name: Raspberry Wheat
products.notes: The Raspberry Pi is the computing phenomenon of Cambridge and this wheat beer is the raspberry phenomenon of Cambridgeshire. The sourness of the wheat is balanced by the raspberries, leading to a refreshing beer.

producers.name: St. Peter's
producers.notes: St. Peter South Elmham, Suffolk est. 1996

products.name: Dark G-free
products.notes: Suffolk grown, Sovereign bittering hops provide the floral notes for this full bodied gluten-free beer.

products.name: G-Free
products.notes: A clean, crisp gluten free ale with a pilsner style lager finish and aromas of citrus and mandarin from American Amarillo hops.

products.name: Grapefruit
products.notes: We use our Wheat Beer as a base for this superbly refreshing beer. The zesty/pithy grapefruit is in complete harmony with the hops and malt. Excellent as an apritif or as a refreshing change.

products.name: Comet
products.notes: Pale, straw coloured refreshing session bitter that combines English barley and three American hop varieties. Zesty bitterness with citrus aromas.

products.name: Sirius
products.notes: Golden in colour and full bodied with moderate sweetness and alcohol, balanced by generous hopping using cascade, chinook and other new world varieties.

products.name: Jaipur
products.notes: A citrus-dominated India Pale Ale, its immediate impression is soft and smooth yet builds to a crescendo of massive hoppiness accentuated by honey. An enduring, bitter finish.

products.name: Kipling
products.notes: Golden blonde beer with an exquisite passionfruit, gooseberry and mango aroma. An initial sweetness and full body are balanced by a lasting grapefruit-like bitter finish.

products.name: Chopper
products.notes: Light refreshing pale ale. A single hop beer made with Chinook hops.

products.name: Pale Ale No. 1
products.notes: Well balanced and hoppy with citrus notes. Brewed with Maris Otter and lager malts and Amarillo hops.

products.name: Goat Sanctuary
products.notes: Very pale, straw coloured, very dry and hoppy beer.

products.name: Tom's Tipple
products.notes: Chocolate flavours, sweetness well balanced with Fuggles bittering hop.

products.name: Runner
products.notes: A dark copper bitter brewed with three different types of hops and five types of malt.

products.name: Swift
products.notes: Brewed with both lager (Saaz) and ale (Cascade) hops for the perfect blend of flavour and refreshment. Juicy, gently hoppy and mellow.

products.name: Learning to Fly
products.notes: Light in colour. Clean and dry with citrus flavours.

products.name: Sandman
products.notes: Deep golden strong bitter. Boldly hopped, predominantly with Australian Galaxy hops, importing clean citrus flavours and aroma of passion fruit.

products.name: Crafty Stoat
products.notes: Made to a recipe developed by the Durden Park Beer Circle to recreate a stout brewed by Ushers in 1885. Six different malts and a huge amount of English Fuggles make a dark and complex beer.

products.name: Hop Black
products.notes: Dark Ale with lots of hoppy bitterness, dark in colour but with a floral aroma.

products.name: Fresh
products.notes: A pale ale made with new-harvest Northern and Southern hemisphere hops. A punchy hop character alongside an appetising bitterness and a crisp dry finish.

products.name: Scarlet Fever
products.notes: Citrus and floral notes from aromatic New World hops balance the smooth caramel and bready sweetness of traditional English malts, before a long, crisp citrus finish.

products.name: Geniuss
products.notes: A full-bodied stout made with chocolate and caramalts to give a roasted flavour with a hint of liquorice with some brambly fruit.

products.name: Revenge
products.notes: Amber coloured and well-hopped, for a distinct bitterness with a sweetish finish that makes this a warmer beer.

products.name: Against the Grain
products.notes: A full flavoured gluten-free bitter with a good, creamy head, refreshing bitterness and a citrus hop aftertaste.

products.name: Mallard
products.notes: Refreshing, easy drinking beer with a fruity bitterness and a lingering, dry finish.

products.name: Bure Gold
products.notes: A classic aromatic golden ale brewed using pale and lightly roasted malts in combination with American and Slovenian aroma hops.

products.name: Craft Lager
products.notes: Continental style lager brewed using Norfolk grown lager malt and German Hallertau Blanc and Perle hops, creating a lager with real flavour. Fermented slowly at a lower temperature.

products.name: Flagon Dry
products.notes: A highly aromatic and easy drinking ale, brewed using Norfolk grown and malted Maris Otter supplemented with finest Norfolk honey. A combination of Styrian Golding and Nelson Sauvin hops provide a memorable drinking experience.

products.name: Nelson's Revenge
products.notes: An infusion of vine fruit, malt and hops provide a rich, rewarding experience. The aromas and flavours bounce merrily along to a sweet, Madeira-like finale.

products.name: Norfolk Nog
products.notes: Smooth, rich and rounded 'Old Ale' with velvety texture and hints of chocolate, treacle and liquorice.

products.name: Wherry
products.notes: Fresh and zesty with crisp floral flavours. A background of sweet malt and a hoppy 'grapefruit' bitter finish this champion bitter.
